Question: During the trip, this person acquires a Baywatch booklet at a yard sale and continues gathering footage for his documentary.
Hints: This person is also interviewed on live television and disrupts the weather report.
Except for this person, Azamat, Luenell, and Pamela Anderson, none of the characters are portrayed by actors.
This person was previewed at the 2006 Comic-Con International in San Diego, California, on July 21, 2006.
